dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Trump Inauguration 2025: The Big Tech CEOs in attendance
News Content: As President-elect Donald Trump's 2025 Inauguration ceremony is underway, many are taking note of the Silicon Valley personalities in attendance. Yahoo Finance host Rachelle Akuffo joins the program to acknowledge several of the Big Tech CEOs at Trump's swearing-in, including Tesla (TSLA) CEO Elon Musk, Amazon (AMZN) founder Jeff Bezos, Meta Platforms' (META) Mark Zuckerberg, Apple (AAPL) chief executive, and even TikTok president Shou Zi Chew.

Ahead of the January 20 ceremony, Nvidia (NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang stated he will be out of the country but "look[s] forward to congratulating the Trump administration when they take office."

Watch President Donald Trump's 2025 Inauguration ceremony, while staying up to date with all the market news and economic data covered by Yahoo Finance.

This post was written by Luke Carberry Mogan. Related Videos

00:38

Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.

Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
} 
Do not generate output that isn't in properly formatted JSON.

```json
{
  "reasoning": "The news article reports on the attendance of Big Tech CEOs, including Apple's CEO, at President-elect Donald Trump's 2025 Inauguration ceremony. This event may have a neutral impact on the stock price of Apple Inc. (AAPL) as it simply indicates the presence of tech leaders at a political event without any direct implications on Apple's business or financials. However, considering that the presence of these CEOs could be interpreted in various ways by the market, it's essential to note that their attendance doesn't inherently carry a positive or negative sentiment regarding Apple's stock performance. Given that there are no direct implications on Apple's business or financial performance from this news, and it seems to be more of a neutral event, I would estimate the probabilities based on the lack of direct negative or positive impact on Apple's stock price from this event.",

  "company_name": "Apple Inc.",
  "company_symbol": "AAPL",
  "news_headline": "Trump Inauguration 2025: The Big Tech CEOs in attendance",
  "probability_of_stock_price_rise": 0.47,
  "probability_of_stock_price_fall": 0.53
}
```
